Yady, ili vsemirnaya istoriya otravleniy

AKA

Poisons or the World History of Poisoning


Year: 2001
Country: Russia
Genre: Comedy
Duration: 1:43:47

Subtitles: no

Directed by Karen Shakhnazarov
Cast: Oleg Basilashvili, Ignat Akrachkov, Alexander Bashirov, Jeanne Dudanova, Lyudmila Kasatkina, Catherine Klimov, etc.

description
Moscow, 2000. Locksmith Arnold takes on a neighbor's wife of actor Oleg Volkov. Oleg decides to get drunk at a nearby bar, where he meets an ordinary pensioner Prokhorov. The old man has suffered a simple way of revenge - to poison offenders. And all at once began to turn. Time has gone back to the great poison of all ages and nations, from Nero to Catherine of Medici in Rome and the medieval ancient Persia ... - in general, world history began poisoning.

Extras. information
Grand Prix at the ORFF "Kinotavr", 2001.
Odds Prize in Honfleur, 2001.
